languages.text:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to re-roll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

traits.locale_text:
Each time the wearer uses a minor psychic power, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to reroll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} test and is then removed.

Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to reroll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to reroll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

languages.text:
装备者每次使用次要{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，所有受灵能能力影响的盟友都会获得1层“好运伴身”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。
拥有“好运伴身”的角色在攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败时，可再次重骰，之后移除此效果。
languages.original_text:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
Thick luck allows those affected to reroll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

traits.locale_text:
装备者每次使用次要灵能力量时，所有受灵能力量影响的盟友都会获得1层“好运伴身”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。
拥有“好运伴身”的角色在攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}失败时，可再次重骰，之后移除此效果。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж применяет малую {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, все союзники, на которых она действует, получают +1 уровень эффекта "завидная удачливость".
Он позволяет повторить попытку атаки, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} в случае провала, после чего снимается.
languages.original_text:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to reroll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж применяет малую психосилу, все союзники, на которых она действует, получают +1 уровень эффекта "завидная удачливость".
Он позволяет повторять попытки атаки, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} в случае провала, после чего эффект снимается.

Когда персонаж применяет малую психосилу, все союзники, на которых она действует, получают +1 уровень эффекта "завидная удачливость".
Он позволяет повторять попытки атаки, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} в случае провала, после чего эффект снимается.

languages.text:
使用者が弱い{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使用するたび、この力に影響を受ける味方すべてが強運の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}のスタックを1獲得する。
強運の影響を受けた者は攻撃失敗、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}をリロールすることができ、 その後取り除かれる。
languages.original_text:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
Thick luck allows those affected to reroll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が弱い超能力を使用するたび、この力に影響を受ける味方すべてが濃い運の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のスタックを1獲得する。
濃い運の影響を受けた者は攻撃失敗、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}をリロールすることができ、 その後取り除かれる。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador use un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} menor, todos los aliados afectados por este poder obtienen +1 acumulación del efecto suerte a raudales.
Suerte a raudales permite a los afectados volver a tirar un ataque fallido, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y luego se pierde.
languages.original_text:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to re-roll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador use un poder psíquico menor, todos los aliados afectados por este poder obtienen +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} suerte a raudales.
Suerte a raudales permite a los afectados volver a tirar un ataque fallido, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y luego se pierde.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger eine sekundäre {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} einsetzt, erhalten alle von dieser Kraft beeinflussten Verbündeten +1 Stapel des Effektes "Großes Glück".
"Großes Glück" erlaubt Charakteren bei erfolgloser Angriffs, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} ein erneutes Würfeln und wird anschließend entfernt.
languages.original_text:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to re-roll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

traits.locale_text:
Jedes Mal wenn der Träger eine sekundäre psionische Kraft einsetzt, erhalten alle von dieser Kraft beeinflussten Verbündeten +1 Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} Großes Glück.
Großes Glück erlaubt Charakteren bei erfolgloser Angriffs-, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} ein erneutes Würfeln und wird anschließend entfernt.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} mineur, tous les alliés sous l'effet de ce pouvoir bénéficient de +1 cumul de l'effet Accélérateur de chance.
Accélérateur de chance permet à tous ceux qui en bénéficient de retenter un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'attaque, d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} manqué en relançant les dés, après quoi cet effet se dissipe.
languages.original_text:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to re-roll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir psychique mineur, tous les alliés sous l'effet de ce pouvoir bénéficient de +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Accélérateur de Chance.
Accélérateur de Chance permet à tous ceux qui en bénéficient de retenter un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'attaque, d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} manqué en relançant les dés, après quoi cet effet se dissipe.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un pouvoir psychique mineur, tous les alliés sous l'effet de ce pouvoir bénéficient de +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Accélérateur de Chance.
Accélérateur de Chance permet à tous ceux qui en bénéficient de retenter un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'attaque, d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} manqué en relançant les dés, après quoi cet effet se dissipe.

languages.text:
Takan kişi her küçük {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullandığında bu güçten etkilenen tüm dost birimler, +1 yoğun şans etkisi birikimi kazanırlar.
Yoğun şans; etkilenenlerin başarısız bir saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} testine tekrar girebilmelerini sağlar. Test tekrarlanınca ortadan kalkar.

Thick luck allows those affected to re-roll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.
